subject: Travel
title: The Spice Islands Frenzy
description: A quick win: understand The Spice Islands Frenzy.

hook.text: Nutmeg grew on only a handful of tiny islands in Indonesia. Europeans killed for control of them.

buildup.text: The Dutch East India Company waged wars to monopolize the Banda Islands and their nutmeg supply.

discovery.text: In 1621, the Dutch massacred most of Banda's population to secure total control of the trade.

twist.text: England traded its claim on the Banda island of Run for a Dutch island called Manhattan.

climax.text: New York exists because England swapped a nutmeg island for it in the Treaty of Breda, 1667.

punchline.text: Manhattan was traded for a handful of nutmeg trees.

quiz.question: What did England trade to get Manhattan?
